thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-New Dimension To Acquire Portfolio Of Advanced Gold, Silver Properties In Argentina

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-New Dimension To Acquire Portfolio Of Advanced Gold, Silver Properties In Argentina
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - New Dimension Resources Ltd:
* NEW DIMENSION TO ACQUIRE PORTFOLIO OF ADVANCED GOLD AND SILVER PROPERTIES IN SANTA CRUZ PROVINCE, ARGENTINA
* SAYS UPON SUCCESSFUL CLOSING OF TRANSACTIONS, ERIC ROTH TO BE APPOINTED PRESIDENT AND CEO AND DIRECTOR OF CO
* SAYS UPON SUCCESSFUL CLOSING OF PROPERTY ACQUISITION AGREEMENTS, FRED HEWETT WILL BE APPOINTED CHAIRMAN OF BOARD
* SAYS ENTERED PROPERTY ACQUISITION DEALS TO GET 100% INTEREST IN CERTAIN SANTA CRUZ PROVINCE GOLD-SILVER PROJECTS FROM SANDSTORM GOLD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
